alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:56PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Monroe, Escambia, southern Conecuh, southern Covington, northern Okaloosa and northeastern Santa Rosa Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Samson to 10 miles east of East Brewton to near Uriah. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brewton, Florala, Flomaton, Baker, East Brewton, Uriah, Castleberry, Laurel Hill, Lockhart, Pollard, Riverview, I65 And AL 113 and I65 And AL 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
